text:
This Chapter shall become effective upon passage, except that the Fee imposed by this Ordinance shall become operative and be imposed on October 1, 2009, and shall not apply to Cigarette Sales that occur prior to October 1, 2009. 
(Added by Ord. 173-09, File No. 090724, App. 7/21/2009)
